subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: The question of what to do about an accusation against Jerry Sandusky was extensively debated by Joe Paterno and Penn State officials, according to an independent investigation.
snippet: The question of what to do about an accusation against Jerry Sandusky was extensively debated by Joe Paterno and Penn State officials, according to an independent investigation.
